title: About Quality Tracker
description: Quality Tracker is a comprehensive quality management platform designed to help development teams maintain high software quality standards while accelerating delivery timelines. Our tool bridges the gap between requirements management and test execution, providing clear visibility into quality metrics and release readiness.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower development teams to ship high-quality software with confidence by providing clear visibility into requirement coverage, test execution, and release readiness through automated metrics and intuitive dashboards.

items.title: Traceability
items.description: Complete visibility from requirements to test execution

items.title: Quality Gates
items.description: Automated quality thresholds to prevent low-quality releases

items.title: Real-time Metrics
items.description: Live dashboards showing quality health and progress

items.title: Team Collaboration
items.description: Centralized quality information for all stakeholders

users.title: QA Teams
users.description: Comprehensive test management and execution tracking

users.title: Development Teams
users.description: Quality visibility integrated into development workflows

users.title: Project Managers
users.description: Release readiness insights and quality reporting
